channel.title: Help on Curses
channel.description: Hi I vain I helped me with getting a command to switch to curses and ive got the coding and all but when i do the command it doesnt switch to curses it just takes the pk points away. please help.

item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995

I Vain I:

Wow; I’m so confused.

I guess i cant make a command that does it. :S

item.title: Help on Curses
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("curses")) { if (c.pkPoints > 199) { if (c.altarPrayed == 1) c.altarPrayed = 0; if (c.altarPrayed == 0) c.altarPrayed = 1; c.pkPoints -= 200; c.sendMessage("You lose 200 pk points for switching your curses."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need at least 200 pk points to do this."); return; } }Try this.[/quote]
Yeah its not switching now.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on Curses
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:389848”]Try this;

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("curses")) { if (c.pkPoints > 199) { if (c.altarPrayed == 1) c.altarPrayed = 0; else c.altarPrayed = 1; c.pkPoints -= 200; c.sendMessage("You lose 200 pk points for switching your curses."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need at least 200 pk points to do this."); return; } }I think it had to do with the ternary statement.[/quote]
Hey i have a problem, it switched the first time but now when i try to switch it doesnt do it.

Read full topic
